title: SuperMarket Billing System
description: Developed a  miniproject-Supermarket Billing System which clearly focused on creating an efficient, user-friendly interface for supermarket transactions, integrating Java for front-end functionality and SQL for seamless database management.

title: Cloud based mobile application for visually impaired
description: The project focused on providing the visually impaired to read the documents, or help them to know the world of letters. It is mainly a cloud based application which was developed in an android phone.

title: Portfolio Creation
description: Design a personalized and responsive portfolio that has unique style using JSX for seamless component-based UI and CSS for fine-tuned styling. Impress visitors with visually appealing presentation of work, ensuring that portfolio stands out in the digital landscape.
